resources.string: You can only capture 10 pictures at a time
Not enough storage. Try again later
Are you sure you want to close the camera? Your photos will be discarded.
Permission to access camera and gallery required. Please grant permission in your device settings.
Permission to access camera, gallery and location required. Please grant permission in your device settings.
Location is not allowed. Please turn on your location device settings.
Location is not allowed. Please enable the high accuracy mode for your location setting.
